review: I have used a couple other set top boxes (Chromecast & Roku) and loved them. I gave my father this for Christmas and it is absolutely awesome! The look and feel of the user interface, menu and options of streaming content is the best I have seen. Apple has been doing it longer and I believe they set the bar so high  the other providers trying to catch up. It almost makes me want to get rid of my android phone and go back to Apple. My father who is not technically gifted has no problem using Apple TV and he absolutely loves it. He takes it with him when traveling,  from room to room in his house and would probably put it in his car if he could figure out a way to do it. I would definitely recommend Apple TV if you are looking at set top boxes.
